title: Fernando Arrabal - Viva la Muerte / Long live death (1971)
description:
WWW.MAKINGOFF.ORG

director - Fernando Arrabal


At the end of the Spanish civil war, Fando, a boy of about ten, tries to make sense of war and his father\&#039;s arrest. His mother is religious, sympathetic to the Fascists; his father is accused of being a Red. Fando discovers that his mother may have aided in his father\&#039;s arrest. Oedipal fantasies and a lad\&#039;s natural curiosity about sex and death mix with his search for his mother\&#039;s nature and his father\&#039;s fate. Will Fando survive the search?

ENGLISH, SPANISH, POLISH AND PORTUGUESE SUBTITLES
